name: Aggregate PubSub
description: A pipeline that reads pubsub events, groups them by accountId, and then writes to another topic

parameters.name: pubsubReadTopic
parameters.label: Pubsub topic to read data from

parameters.name: windowDuration
parameters.label: Duration in which data will be written. Defaults to 5 minutes.
parameters.help_text:
Allowed formats are:
Ns (for seconds, example: 5s),
Nm (for minutes, example: 12m),
Nh (for hours, example: 2h).

parameters.name: pubsubWriteTopic
parameters.label: Pubsub topic to write data to
